channel.title: OrangeVPS Offical Launch! 50% off! Virttuozo VPS! Windows VPS from $6.50!
channel.description:
OrangeVPS. Have officially opened! After 2 year's of careful planning! We Offer Purely Virttuozo VPS.
We only use the best hardware with the following!
84GB DDR3 ECC 4X Hexa-Core Xeon L5640 (48 Core's Total) SuperMicro LSI-Mega-Raid 10 Controller's 8X 1TB Raptor Drive's 15K RPM!
Windows Plans!
W1-Tiny 512MB DDR3 ECC 50GB Storage Unlimited Transfer 12 Core's 100MB'S Port! Power Control Panel! $12.50 -- $6.50 /w Discount
http://cp.orangevps.com/?cmd=cart
W2-Medium 1024MB DDR3 ECC 100GB Storage Unlimited Transfer 12 Core's 100MB'S Port! Power Control Panel! $20.00-- $10.00 /w Discount http://cp.orangevps.com/?cmd=cart
W3-Large 2024MB DDR3 ECC 150GB Storage Unlimited Transfer 12 Core's 100MB'S Port! Power Control Panel! $35.00-- $17.50 /w Discount http://cp.orangevps.com/?cmd=cart
W4-Sonic 4024MB DDR3 ECC 200GB Space! Unlimited Transfer 12 Core's 100MB'S Port! Power Control Panel! $55.00-- $27.50 /w Discount http://cp.orangevps.com/?cmd=cart
OS: 2008
Linux Plans!
L1-Tiny Dedicated: 256MB DDR3 ECC Burst: 512MB DDR3 ECC Storage: 25GB Storage 100MB'S Port Unltimated Transfer Hardware Firewall/DDOS Protection! Power Contol Panel! $12.50-- $6.50 /w Discount http://"http://cp.orangevps.com/?cmd=cart&action=add&id=5
L2-Small Dedicated: 1024MB DDR3 ECC Burst: 1502MB DDR3 ECC Storage: 50GB Storage 100MB'S Port Unltimated Transfer Hardware Firewall/DDOS Protection! Power Contol Panel! $18.99-- $9.99 /w Discount http://"http://cp.orangevps.com/?cmd=cart&action=add&id=6
L3-Medium Dedicated: 2024MB DDR3 ECC Burst: 3024MB DDR3 ECC Storage: 25GB Storage 100MB'S Port Unltimated Transfer Hardware Firewall/DDOS Protection! Power Contol Panel! $35.00-- $15.00 /w Discount http://"http://cp.orangevps.com/?cmd=cart&action=add&id=7
L4-Sonic Dedicated: 4024MB DDR3 ECC Burst: 6024MB DDR3 ECC Storage: 200GB Storage 100MB'S Port Unltimated Transfer Hardware Firewall/DDOS Protection! Power Contol Panel! $75.00-- $35.00 /w Discount http://"http://cp.orangevps.com/?cmd=cart&action=add&id=8
Please Use Promotion Code: 50%launch If you have any sale's question's please ask via PM or via this sales thread.
